string.text:
The AUG (Armee-Universal-Gewehr) is the standard small arm of many Armed Forces and Special Units all over the world since 1977. It is famous for its modular bullpup design, making it a short, well-balanced rifle with high accuracy and reliability. The A1 variant is fitted with an integrated 1.5x scope.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]Austria
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Manufacturer: %c[ui_gray_2]Steyr Arms

The AUG (Armee-Universal-Gewehr) is the standard small arm of many Armed Forces and Special Units all over the world since 1977. It is famous for its modular concept “Bullpup“ design making it a short, well-balanced rifle with high accuracy and reliability. The A2 variant features a redesigned charging handle and a detachable telescopic sight which can be replaced with a Picatinny rail.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]Austria
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Manufacturer: %c[ui_gray_2]Steyr Arms

The AUG (Armee-Universal-Gewehr) is the standard small arm of many Armed Forces and Special Units all over the world since 1977. It is famous for its modular concept “Bullpup“ design making it a short, well-balanced rifle with high accuracy and reliability. The A3 variant features a Picatinny rail on top of the receiver and an external bolt release.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]Austria
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Manufacturer: %c[ui_gray_2]Steyr Arms

Developed as an improvement of the Australian F88 Austeyr, the EF88 is the most modern AUG on the market. Featuring better ergonomics and increased reliability, recoil control and accuracy, the EF88 is an incredibly unique and rare weapon.
 
 %c[pda_white]CHARACTERISTICS:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]Austria
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Manufacturer: %c[ui_gray_2]Thales Australia

The AUG (Armee-Universal-Gewehr) is the standard small arm of many Armed Forces and Special Units all over the world since 1977. It is famous for its modular concept “Bullpup“ design making it a short, well-balanced rifle with high accuracy and reliability. The A3 9mm variant features a Picatinny rail on top of the receiver, an external bolt release and has been rechambered for use with 9mm Parabellum.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]Austria
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Manufacturer: %c[ui_gray_2]Steyr Arms
